description: Colchester return to winning ways with a battling victory at Bromley.
title: Bromley 0-1 Colchester United
maintext:
This will be Bromley’s third ever competitive meeting with Colchester United, with the Ravens losing 4-0 in an FA Cup 1st Round clash in 2009, before the pair drew their League Two reverse fixture 1-1 in September.
Colchester United have won just one of their last 13 league games against sides from London (D5 L7), last winning away in the capital in February 2022 during a 1-0 victory over Leyton Orient.
Bromley are unbeaten across their last six home league games (W2 D4), conceding more than one goal in just one of those matches – a 5-2 victory over Newport.
Colchester have lost each of their last two league games, and will be looking to avoid recording three defeats in succession for the first time since New Year’s Day 2024.
